doc.title: Third Trinity, Cambridge, Winning the Race for the Grand Challenge Cup. Taken at Henley on July 10th, 1902
doc.plot: In this picture we bring into view the famous Third Trinity of Cambridge winning the Grand Challenge Cup by a scant half boat length, in a most exciting finish with the Leander crew. The crews pass close to our camera, and the audience can scarcely make out who is the winner, so close is the finish. A very fine film in every respect.
